Uses of Interface
videopoker.Videopoker

  • Packages that use Videopoker 
    Package Description
    ourvideopoker
    This Package provides an implementation for a videopoker machine based on the interface Videopoker it gives also a variation for the videopoker game that is called the DoubleBonus 10/7 based on the interface VideoPokerVariation
    players
    This package provides different game modes to interact with the interface Videopoker If the videopoker interface is used, the user can use the following game modes: Debug, Interactive, Simulation and GUI The expected commands are the: bet (b), deal (d), hold (h), advise (a), credit ($), statistics (s) and quit (q)

    • Uses of Videopoker in ourvideopoker

      Classes in ourvideopoker that implement Videopoker 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OurVideoPoker
      This Class is our implementation of a videopoker machine, it implements the Videopooker interface
      class  OurVideoPokerFile
      This class extends the OurVideoPoker to add funcionalitys to run a videopooker with a deck that is load from a file

    • Uses of Videopoker in players

      Fields in players declared as Videopoker 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Videopoker Player.game
      Object that allow you to interact with the game
      Constructors in players with parameters of type Videopoker 
      Constructor and Description
      DebugPlayer(Videopoker game, java.lang.String cmdfile)
      Construct a Debug mode player
      InteractivePlayer(Videopoker game)
      Construct a Interactive mode player
      Player(Videopoker game)
      Constructor that initializes a game with a initial number of credits
      SimulationPlayer(Videopoker game, int betValue, int numPlays)
      Construct a Simulation mode player
